website_summaries.verdict: The T-Mobile G2x's simple Android interface, blazingly fast speeds, and polished look make it the phone to beat in T-Mobile's lineup.
pros: The T-Mobile G2x features a 1GHz Nvidia Tegra 2 dual-core processor that delivers great performance
It also has a sharp design, plenty of multimedia features, and HSPA+ speeds
cons: The T-Mobile G2x's photo quality did not meet our expectations
The call quality could also be slightly better

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional, but handle with care!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite salad bowl by far. I eat a giant salad every day, and this is the perfect size. My only compliant is that this is the second one I've had to buy. The bowls are NOT chip resistant and I have three teens who often do dishes and stack them and twice now they have chipped one of my Mason Cash bowls. I plan on taking care of this one myself, because I want to keep it around for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F. Mcrae

customer_reviews.title: The best mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are a great combination of sturdy, well-insulated for proofing bread, strong enough to stay put, and light enough to move easily. I've had several larger bowls of this line for many years but wanted a smaller one, and the blue color goes well with the old standard white and bamboo. I see these are now made in Portugal instead of England, but there seems to be no difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition. Very attractive and roomy for mixing bread ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. Very attractive and roomy for mixing bread dough at our cabin which is why I got it. Lighter weight than I was expecting so maybe a little fragile but my wife especially likes lighter weight for ease in handling, washing, etc. outstanding quality overall and great price - I had been looking for a large mixing bowl for a couple years now but resisted due to higher price of other brands/deals and as it was for our lake cabin. I would definitely recommend this bowl. Just love it and hope to pass on to my kids (who also make bread) as it is heirloom worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Twohy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Exactly What I was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my bread-making bowl. I had one that was older than I am (64) that had been my mother's but it was broken during my last move. I was heartbroken! I couldn't find the same that she had but this one will work just fine. It's big enough and sturdy enough to last. Baking bread is one of my passions!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Dodson

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and the recipient was delighted. It came wrapped perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient was delighted. It came wrapped perfectly. Really good job. Thank you and Merry Christmas and Happy Holiday. Paula Campbell
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, seems durable so far and the perfect size for mixing larger quantities. I'm considering ordering a smaller size as well for display on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymou$

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixing Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a much loved bowl (of the same kind) that I have used for over 40 years. Glad they are still being made.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love Mason Cash bowls! Great for mixing baking batters. The color of this bow SO pretty!
customer_reviews.author: marielarock

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls--good looking, too ;)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl, easy to grip, good weight. Well wrapped in bubble wrap for shipping. Arrived quickly and in great condition. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: This bowl is wonderful. I have one other Mason Cash bowl and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is wonderful. I have one other Mason Cash bowl and they are my favorite. I had never seen one in blue and I'm really happy that I got this one. If there are more sizes I would buy them all. Arrived quickly and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Michelle Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very well packed!
customer_reviews.text: It came fast in these days, and very well packed. The bowl is beyond beautiful and a very good size for my sourdough bread baking ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great mixing bowl and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls just wish they weren't so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gravelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl, it is steady and sturdy, easy to clean and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chipped bowl
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is chipped on the top edge. I didn't notice the chips until the return period was past. We are very careful with our things, and I think it may have been chipped when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Williams

customer_reviews.title: Unuseable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use because it was broken into a million pieces
customer_reviews.author: Tommie West

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Mason Cash bowl I have purchased and it won't be the last. It's not too heavy and the color and design are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Mikula

customer_reviews.title: Stylish quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what I wanted. Love the color, love the size & love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Wife really likes it... Nice product and timely shipping. Would buy again. Recommend it to anyone that I know !
customer_reviews.author: Xtreme Motors

customer_reviews.title: Just love this bowl
customer_reviews.text: Just love this bowl. The color is just lovely and the size is just right for my cake baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Louvar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but don't use metal utensils!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color. Nice bowl. I'm watching the Great British Baking Show ad they use Mason Cash a lot. That's why I ordered it! It's beautifula and I hope it will wear well over time. So... update: DO NOT USE A HANDHELD ELECTRIC MIXER! It will merk up the inside with ugly grey streaks! Bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bowl yesterday so have not had an opportunity to use it yet. This is my first Mason and Cole bowl, and it looks great. As others have mentioned, it does appear to be lighter weight which may allow it to crack easier, so will be very careful in handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy - Olympia

customer_reviews.title: Great for dough
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl at a great price. I like that there is a rim at the bottom, because I put it on a heating pad to let dough rise, and that creates a little space so it is not directly on the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bowl...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bowl. A pretty bowl that works for what bowls are supposed to do. It feels good in the hand and the bright color makes me happy. I ordered more of the same brand because they're so darn cute! This one was made in Portugal. I just got it and used it once thus far so I'm not sure yet how it will hold up after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of this bowl but had to return as it was shattered during delivery and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Shand

customer_reviews.title: I Love the Mason Cash bowls
customer_reviews.text: I Love the Mason Cash bowls. One was given to me for a Birthday Gift. I love it so much I purchased 2 more. I love the large size and wide open top. They are heavy duty but like weight in feel , easy to use and move around. Great colors to pick from too. My favorite Bowl and I have lots of dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls though I wish they were made in England as they originally were.
customer_reviews.author: Doobie Do

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size for mixing pancake batter or serving potatoe salad
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with quality of this bowl. It is the perfect size for mixing pancake batter or serving potatoe salad. I would not hesitate to recommend it to my friends. It is a great bowl that will be used often.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and size of the bowl. Perfect for bread making.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love Mason cash items
customer_reviews.text: Love Mason cash items. Gorgeous blue color-really pops in the midst of other bowls. Thinking of getting the red one next...
customer_reviews.author: April A Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: BAKER'S DELIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bake A LOT of bread and needed a big bowl This definitely fills the bill. It easily accommodates any loaf and and I love that I can proof in the same bowl and it's not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyireland

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: item as described, I'm happy with my purchase and communication from seller
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is beautiful and will be a great addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Imken

product_meta.title: Mason Cash Color Mix S12 11.4" Powder Blue Mixing Bowl
product_meta.description: Stir some colour into your kitchen with the Mason Cash colour mix mixing bowl range. The Mason Cash S12 (29cm) mixing bowl retains the charm of Mason Cash classics whilst bringing a bright, vibrant palette to any kitchen. Made from chip resistant earthenware
feature_bullets: Chip resistant fine stoneware mixing bowl from Mason Cash, the bakeware experts
Traditional, distinctive patterned exterior helps grip the bowl when mixing
Bowl counters the tendency to move during manual mixing
Bright, vibrant colour palette - stir some colour into your kitchen
Dishwasher and microwave safe, bowl diameter: 29 cm, height: 14 cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
